phrases: Nothing holds his attention like an intense game.
Would you rather have been with a girl who plays games with you?
You do not choose a girl based on that...
Well, maybe that is just what dating him is like...
But to be honest I feel miserable right now...
He does not look at me at all, either...
Yeah, it is about to start.
I have been looking forward to it all day.
I am sorry I am gutless, but this is my limit.
Just hold out a little longer!
The heat must be getting to our opponents too.
I woke up and as usual forgot my cell and missed the Express.
My life reflected in the train window.
I am sure I have something that I will not lose to anyone in Japan...
Here I go, at my dauntless pace.
Pass away, today's sadness, raining in the sun!
Hesitation, repetition, dreaming all night, all night.
Farewell sadness, to outer space you go!
Look to the sky and shout at the top of your lungs!
That is pretty good, chaining a low light kick into a standing super.
I can only pull it off about one in five tries though.
These two sure are a trip to watch.
Is not your hair too long?
I mean, it makes you look kind of scary.
If you cut it, or even just added some color, it would lighten up.
Is it like this for cosplay?
Hmm, that is part of it...
People told me they envied how black and straight it was.
I guess they had a point, but this is Japan.
The salon I go to gives discounts for referrals.
I am not used to places like that, though...
Are not your tits too big?
What is your cup size again?
Oh my god, it takes cups that big to support those manga-sized tits?
It is just like that soccer...
I am going to claim sexual harassment.
I am trying to get you to discuss something with me.
Well you see, this is about one of my high school friends.
She says she is been dating an otaku lately.
Well, at a glance he seems different from Kohsaka.
So anyway, when they have sex at night they leave the TV on.
The guy says it is to mask the noise since the walls are thin.
Some anime came on during it...
And just before that, they had switched to doggy style.
I wonder if he was back where she could not see him watching it...
Lasting more than 30 minutes is amazing!
Laughing about it only digs your own grave.
You saw it, did not you?
It is quite a highly rated anime right now.
Then maybe it would be best if she cosplayed after all!
I mean, she got a reaction from cat ears a while back.
A-All right, why do not I lend her a costume?
I am sure the size difference would just make her feel bad.
Besides, I do not think you want it being used for that.
You were talking about a friend?
If you had a girlfriend, would you want to have sex in costume?
I do not even think about that kind of thing, not having a girlfriend.
Ah, but I have seen cosplay scenes in adult videos...
They are not very interesting, though.
The women are just porn actresses, after all.
There are also cosplay dojinshi, erotic ones.
Yeah, I saw some in a catalog at Comic Fest.
I wonder if they are on CD-ROM.
Look at me when you are talking.
So anyway, you are going to have to ask Tanaka about stuff like that.
But you would not be able to do that...
Not me, it is a friend of mine.
But that is what we are thinking about almost all the time.
Even Kohsaka should not be any exception to the rule.
Otherwise he would not be such a good gamer.
Not to mention, he knows a lot of system-related info.
I guess games really are his thing.
I could not possibly become an otaku...
It is better than trying to get his attention with shabby cosplay.
She might find she is an otaku before she knows it.
After careful consideration, the game of choice is Puyo Pop Fever.
You connect and pop falling puyos in this latest of the hit puzzle game series.
That is why you rotate it here like this.
You insert it here, these pop, and these shift down.
It is no use asking us.
Okay, I will give it a shot tonight.
Stop the world so I can get off.
But, thank goodness she got to where she can do it.
He will have a 5-chain put together in no time.
Hopefully he will hold back against her a little...
Know what, though, she was talking about herself before...
I do not like this vibe...
I played it today at Genshiken, it was kind of fun.
Well, I mean, you are a puyo.
That night was the last time Saki Kasukabe ever played a video game...
What, are not you playing league matches today?
Looks like it is best not to pour any more fuel on the fire.
Dammit, if Kohsaka were here, she could just leave with him.
It is almost been a year since you joined, Sasahara.
What do you mean by growth in this case?
Well, I spend a lot more money now.
But I get the feeling that is just me being out of control...
I cannot call myself an otaku when I do not have my own computer.
Whoa, you say you are not otaku?
Maybe I just have a ways to go...
Why do not you buy a computer?
Have you got some mental block against it?
Like I said before, I spent all my money.
If you put your mind to it, you will find a way.
Th-This would be the part where s-someone smacks you down.
But, that is exactly why I do not have any money right now.
I do not know this number...
What is with this big time un-Sasahara-like attitude?
No, I am on my way!
My little sister's at the train station...
Wow, you have got a sister!
First a childhood friend, now a sister!
No, you have got the wrong idea!
She is a fashion slave, a trashy high school chick.
She would not understand us, in fact it is best if you do not meet her.
On that note, you do not go for the little sister look at all.
In fighting games you always use the sexy older female characters.
I can say for a fact that fad's just an illusion for those...
You are such a fool, Sasahara.
Why would I ever need a little sister I am related to?
he is not pulling any punches.
B-But, in a way it is normal.
You will think she is from another planet if you see her.
Well, that is how it goes.
Yup, she is got nothing in common with us...
You cannot even see her face through the make-up.
What do you think she calls him?
You mean you came all this way for that?
My boyfriend and I went to the park zoo in his car...
Were not you the one who said...
I know, but it is no use.
My friends are all the same way too.
Now I go home on my own and we make up big time.
It is the big in thing right now, this whole test thing.
That would not make it on your own...
I will bet she is the type who is easily influenced by friends.
And it only takes an instant.
I cannot see her growing up in the same household as Sasahara.
What was Sasahara's first name again?
I thought you were going to hang out with me.
I asked you not to follow me because you do things like this.
You really are a boring guy.
Do not hit her for that just because she is my sister...
You two look identical in the face.
Is she, like, always this rude?
Something tells me this is going to end ugly...
Come on, that is enough, Kasukabe.
What are you guys up to?
They said he went to Akihabara...
That means he went and bought more pain in the ass otaku crap.
These are the ones we had on order.
What a coincidence, they delivered it right before my eyes.
It is about as tall as I am.
Sasahara's sister needs to talk to him.
Unrolling this huge thing would get in the way, anyway.
There is no one around, though.
She needs to hurry home, too.
There is a test that needs passing, right?
Here is some money, now scram.
I am in no real hurry.
Right now I want to see this.
So looks win out, huh Keiko?
She is from a game I really like.
She is so not ready for us.
9000 for the tapestry, then 5000 loaned to my sister...
Is there any chance Kohsaka would quit being an otaku?
Not at all, he is way more otaku than I am.
He sure does not look it!
Kasukabe over there is also trying to make him quit...
Give it a rest and stop dwelling on looks.
Just leave it to Kohsaka to spice up the situation.
If that is how you spend money, you will never afford a computer.
To not buy what one likes is to deny oneself.
While that is true, we are all aware that you do not own that adult game!
You probably play it at Kohsaka's!
Do not eat for three months!
W-Why not try cutting back on games and DVDs for now?
Will you watch anime again today?
We took no detours or shortcuts...
Only vivid dreams extended deep into the shadows.
We are not quite grown up.
Simple but complicated glistening like marbles.
The time we could see from there sparkled, even if nothing big happened.
What we see from the marbles in our hands now is a little different...
Hey, do you know much about SM?
Heartache's been feeling good to me recently...
I wonder if that is a kind of SM...
I can understand if foreigners do it.
So much is based on western culture and clothing...
But it just does not work for Japanese.
And then these cosplay names, why are they in kanji!?
And it is names like Reika and Sakuya with high stroke counts!
Then their surnames sound like some court noble.
I mean, it is like get a grip and know thyself.
Saki, you just made enemies of a million cosplayers nationwide.
